Uses of Interface
edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.ResultProducer

  • Packages that use ResultProducer 
    Package Description
    edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder
    Provides a set of high level classes that can be used to configure and initiate the speech recognition decoding process.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer
    Provides a set of high level classes and interfaces that are used to perform speech recognition with the Sphinx-4 speech recognition system.

    • Uses of ResultProducer in edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder

      Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder that implement ResultProducer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDecoder
      An abstract decoder which implements all functionality which is independent of the used decoding-paradigm (pull/push).
      class  Decoder
      The primary decoder class
      class  FrameDecoder
      A decoder which does not use the common pull-principle of S4 but processes only one single frame on each call of decode().

    • Uses of ResultProducer in edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer

      Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer that implement ResultProducer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Recognizer
      The Sphinx-4 recognizer.
